string.text: What do you want?
I need the leader of "Freedom". Extremely important information.
And how is it important?
I met the squad of "Debt" near your base.
Oops... looks Like "Debt" are again trying to win...\nSo, coming into the territory, just put the gun away. Do not we have a fire lift: feet stand.
Well.
Good day.
Aha!..
That is?
Yes, no question...
What's the joke?
Oh, man! Healthy!
Hello.
Long time no see!
Do I know you?
Uh-Uh... n-Yes! Hehe...
Honestly, I don't remember.
Hmm... Yes, okay, okay...
What the fuck is this?
Place... place on... Yes this must be the place... in pale, hehe...
But all the same?
... Well, you ask questions, kind stranger!..
And if in fact?
Just relax! SchA-a... Yes... a normal place! Calm. All nishtyak! Yes... You just relax, huh? Not in a hurry...
And you yourself, who will?
I?
Exactly. You. Not me.
Well you and al!.. I... I-I, fantastish!.. Well, I... cook a Meal... here. Cook I! Master knife and seasonings! Parsley there... fennel, herbs... well, grass... Bread too... huh?
Clear.
And canned... the condensed milk... the canned meat... bulls in tomatoes... Yes...
I understand.
Baton... ketchup... eggs... bread... a loaf... cheese. Well, there is. Sausages! The sausage-a! The game... dead...
Okay, got it! At least tell me your name.

Hmm?.. Ah! My name is Slavik... it's because of the label... Not! Apron!.. I have a white apron... And yeah... You sit down, out... And then another sniper... ka-AK will shoot!.. They, you know... Yes, they are...
The kind of village nearby?
Well...
What is "well"?
Huh?
Village.
Ah... There's a village. Products there... condensed milk...
How to get there?
Huh? SchA. SchA think... No, look, it is necessary to you? Relax... Sit down... Sit down, have a smoke, yeah?
I need to go to the village.
Okay... here right now, sit down, Yes... smoke... and normally, Yes... I will take you. No question.
Don't sweat it. Just tell me how to get there.
Yeah... No, well, you problem is given!.. Conductive fine we'll go back together. Here we sit, and Yes...
I don't know where you can get hold of equipment?
Equipment? Et, my brother, the ciphers... cipher!..
Equipment. Weapons. Artifacts.
Weapons... no... my knife... Want a knife? Not? Yeah, but... Artifacts. And what for? Don't sweat it. Let's sit down. Smoke. Let's talk... about the artifacts...
Where in the County you can find the artifacts?

Yes, no question! Artifacts... the roof of the artifacts!.. The swamp is radioactive you know? Not? Well, do not care. There. I mean artifacts. There. In General, you do not hurry. Do not strain. Huh? Artifacts... hehe... artifacts-artifacts...
Okay. Be healthy.
Yeah... you sit down, if you did.
I'm leaving.
Huh? Not a question... relax... yeah? Close the door behind me... I'm leaving... ... tadam...
Yes, sit down!.. Sit them...
Come on, something, pull, huh?
Not a question, brother! Pour!
Well, Well... Well, slapped!..
Wow, good move!.. Keep a bottle... there's still something left.
Well, another pile?
Ah... the thrill! Sorry, the bottle is already agreed. Still there?
I'll have a look.
Yeah, that's it! Keep the stack evenly.
Hehe... and you're quite good at it!.. R-R-times and the new bottle. You have a warehouse?
You... drink, drink. I have a long time practice was not.
For our victory! From...\nOh's, fit well!
Yes... for our victory!
Come on, Come on... There is a Yesh, Yesh... school... huh?
Now I will look...
So... this is the last, okay?.. And I'm n-not master more...
Give it with-Syu-Syu... here!..
Well, you... give... What are you her myself obrigado... fall?..
IK!.. Uh-this bra at the bottom... days!.. M-M-M... yeah, but...
I heard "Freedom" is armed with a modified RG-6. I would like to look at this thing.
Where are you even getting at, man? So I... that you took... and all the ins and outs?.. Yes, you think I am?!
Calmer. I didn't know it was that serious.
Nothing about gun nosy, okay? Who the hell are you, huh?! The first time you see it!..
Come on! I was just asking...
Hush!.. And be careful with him, okay?
Done.
I've... it's... I Heard you have RG-6 is modified... I used one eye to look, huh? Well, really want... N-well glazochkom would be... one...
What about...? You have this... go to... damn, what is it... I forgot!.. What did you ask?
G-R... gramota... grato... ugh! Gra-at-the-met would... I would... look!
No... this is impossible... that's all you want, friend, but it's not... here. Well, not you...
Oh well... I, uh... just! Just ask...
IK!.. The bulldogs, eh?
W-what?.. Ah! So... in the village he! We have them at all... just two... and these... d-woodpeckers! Sowed its... about... brotherali!..
Yeah? Well, it's... b-Boobs...
Hello, brother. I'm from the "Debt", to be run on this site. Do not want to join us?
There is no special desire.
Then under his feet give way... alone.
Don't mind.

Great. Here, behind the hill, the main breeding ground of those bastards - the "free" that the boys gonna shake and to stir.\nThere is, however, a small problem. The entrance to The base one and is well protected. We thought to punch a hole in the fence, but theirs a sniper on the tower prevents us. Don't want to send guys to the bullets... and you let it close, just shoot definitely will not. Take it off - we owe you one, and even the equipment on the base will take what I want, if things work out.
Keep going.
Yes, I already said: all you have to do is shoot the sniper in the tower behind the fence.\nWell, so what?
No, I'm not ready yet.
Then under the feet do not interfere.
I'll try it.
That's fine! As soon As you take it off and we'll start the concert.
There is a small problem. Since the input to the base of one and well guarded, without thinking we were going to do another one, but..
But?

I sent a night fighter to undermine the fence. But, whether the sniper had a good one, if not our day, in General, had stopped it. So now the explosives installed on the fence, and blow it up we can't.
Why?
I don't want to send guys to the bullets that asshole, but you are unable to remove it. In you he will not fire. What do you say?
How much will I get for this?
That is the right approach. 2000 from us for the sniper and a heap of equipment on the basis of the corpses there will be many, I promise you. And we will help and he will be pleased. So how?
Agreed.
Good luck.
First I have to see and then say.
Wait. But not for long.
Thanks for the help, Labeled. Here, you take your fee.
Thank you.
We seem to have agreed ?
So the sniper you failed. Get your legal.
Understood.
A little, okay? We should prepare...
Okay.
Another time.
As you know.
Prior to the meeting.
Well, continue?
What?
Thank you.
We're going to blow the fence and get this party started. You see, the guy is good - so can you do the snipers on the towers? Well, no snipers will be easier for us to get to that freak, Lukas.
Sniper You failed?
Yes.
Good job! Was out of the way... here, take over the work.
Thank you.
What to do?
While we deal with these goats, and speak to the remaining snipers, eh? You're in this business, I look good.
Another time.
Well, look. Will not forcibly.
Good.
That's fine.
Do not bother, Labeled.
Okay.
Go your own way.
Well.
What else?
Nothing.
So three assholes less! You did a great job and we are not burned, and he was left whole. I think so, nobody will know about it, huh?
I don't think.
That's okay. Have a desire to earn, a Stalker?
It is difficult to say.
What do you want to die?
No.
As without it.
Maybe.
Then follow us, talk to our commanding officer.
Commander?
And then. Skull you everything and tell.
Well.

Hey, Stalker! At the time you! We idiots monolitnosti slugger, now will be the next wave to go! We have, you know, the last sniper shot! Can you help? And after the battle pans out, you will not regret!
No, I will not be able to help.
This is a pity. Look, come on, if you change your mind.
Help.
Great! Let's blow the tower, there is Svdm 2 and ammo pile. Hit them from the top down don't go down, and then accidentally treat themselves. The goal is obvious?
Two and Two together.

And correctly. I hope we will talk in the morning. Yeah, don't go too far... and they'll think that running away decided. With all the consequences, think of it, mind you! Well, get yourself into position.
That's right. Okay, down to business. There is speculation that soon here will break the detachment of the monolith. So soon it will be hot.
Clear.
You're right. I hope they will not be too much...
Where's my place?
Go to the tower, there is Svdm 2 and cartridges. You can beat them up and not down, and that under our bullets will fall. The task is clear?
Yes.
Forget it a place, and then the once would be!
It seems all sealed. As for me, enough for today. Thanks for the help! Here you go - here is some money a little more fun with them.
Thank you.
Good Luck, Bullseye!
Great, Bullseye. Lucas sent you?
Yes. To help you asked.
At the time you! We just idiots monolitnosti slugger, now the next wave will go. We have, you know, the last sniper shot! Can you help? And after the battle pans out, you will not regret!
It seems all sealed. As for me, enough for today. Thanks for the help! Here you go - here is some money a little more fun with them.
Thank you.
Good Luck, Labeled.
What is this place?
We call it the Barrier... Yes, it is, in principle, is. It's basically the last normal checkpoint before the center of the Zone. A buffer like this, you know, between humans and Wild territory.
And then there's what?

Then only death... or serving the Monolith. "Our Monolith! In thy name!.." Ugh!..\nin short, go there, no one should. Here we are standing here do not give a shit any flood Zone... the Jedi, damn it. More detainees particularly stupid - at least, I try to center something.
Why do you need it?

And then who, if not us? "Debt"? They, of course, docks for part of the extermination of monsters and unwanted stalkers, but just try to get them something really useful to do! Here you see them? No? Here I am about that. And we, for example, set a goal to destroy the creatures that live here. Barrier, normal Barrier, it will be enough. The main thing is the line, none of the parties crossed...
Well, if you crossed?
Anything can happen. All. I don't want...
Wait! Access to the Armory is restricted to members of "Freedom".
Well, now you can in the Arsenal to enter. There is, however, one problem...
What?
So you do not strain, do not worry. The lock is jammed, that's all. If the wait is unbearable, blow his fucking, and I new later hanged.
Clear.
Miser sent Me here to bloodsuckers to fill up.
And you, Stalker, as in this godforsaken place? Get better legs!
Ah, well then another thing... Then fuck knows what's going on! A couple of us went to the village and never returned. Well, we reluctant to die! I sit here until then - decide what to do next.
Well, brother, you yesterday and did!
I mean?

We are sitting here, looking around, and then you you're going, drunk in zyuzyu! And Prem, most importantly, right in the village, to the bloodsuckers! Well at least you have someone to hold and to put to sleep.
And why are you sitting here?
Then fuck knows what's going on! A couple of us went to the village and never returned. Well, we reluctant to die! I sit here until then - decide what to do next.
You bloodsuckers seen?
What? How's it going?
I flunked them.
Wow! Well, you give! Well, man, you owe me, time to be alive!..
Thank you.

No. Our guys had to go to the old water tower is probably out there somewhere and perished. Since you're a Miser agreed, go to it and see the Address...-then drop me a line! If anything, the letter to relatives your send.
What are you prowling like a Ghost?
Have a look around.
Hello you, I see... Okay, I'll go.
And what brought you here?
Have a look around.
A better place is not found? Here, maybe the most fucked up place in the Area...
What's the harm?

Then fuck knows what's going on... Bloodsuckers, apparently, in the village of start. A couple of us went to the village and never returned. Well, we reluctant to die! I sit here until then - decide what to do next.
That is, you do not know?

Well! If you do nothing and the head is not in order, you can go for a walk around the village. Flood creatures - Miser fork, that's for sure. Hey, the address is drop me a line! If anything, the letter to relatives your send.
Okay, I'll go take a look.
You through the village going?!
Yes.
There's a couple of our left and never came back. Saw them?
No, not seen. Just like the corpses whose.
And bloodsuckers seen?
Seen. Go and see by yourselves, it is already possible: I had stopped them.
Wow! Here is the number! You know what... you go to the Miser on our database. It is for a good cause pays the money.
Okay, I'll go take a look.
What? How's it going?
I filled up those things.
Wow, that was exceptional! You know what... you go to the Miser on our database. It is for a good cause pays.
Go.
As you wish...
And what brought you here?
Have a look around...
A better place is not found? Brings you to the most disgusting place.
What's the harm?
Yes hell knows. Looks like the bloodsuckers in the village of start. A couple of us went to the village and never returned. Well, we have to die a reluctance.
That is, you do not know?

Well! If you do nothing and the head is not in order, you can go for a walk around the village. Flood creatures - Miser fork, that's for sure. Hey, the address is drop me a line! If anything, the letter to relatives your send.
Okay, I'll go take a look.
What? How's it going?
I filled up those things.
Oh Yes! Well, accept my congratulations! And then - most importantly, alive...
Thank you.
Once you've helped the guys at the Barrier, you can count on the rest of our site and our help. Well, from me personally - a few banknotes...
Once you've helped the guys at the Barrier, you can count on the rest of our site and our help. Well, from me personally - a few banknotes...
Hey, Stalker. What do you need?
Yes anything, in General.
Then ran away, huh? Time is money.
I saw a squad of "Debt" on a farm near your base. Eight people, well armed.
What the hell you escaped from the Barrier?! Go do with my base, and I never saw you again...

Damn, I did these goats do not get enough of it! Okay, have to punish them... Well, Stalker, if you help us - we would be grateful. Max - he's the main fighter. To assemble the people and to weed out those elks.
Well.
Good luck, Stalker.
I have already sorted them out.
With a Snitch, so is not formed and a Barrier too? Get off base and that your spirit was not here!
Seriously? How many did you say there were?
Eight people.

Frisky are you, a Stalker... if so, then maybe something else that we benefits? Sad to admit, but we had a Snitch... Pavlik name. Information is transmitted to the side, and this thing has got to stop.
How?
Your task is to follow him to the farm and see to whom it sends information. You don't know about our conversation, too, so...
Do you think I have a job for you?
Possible.

We have, on the basis of a mole by the name of Pavlik, which transmits the information to the side. Although we know this, but know little - it is necessary to prove. Your task is to follow him and learn who he's passing information. I think that today he goes to meet a contact. Go quietly behind him. Carefully so he didn't see - he is very careful. How do you know who he's seeing, then smack him, but at the same time with anyone he meets.
Taken.

We have, on the basis of a mole by the name of Pavlik, which transmits the information to the side. Although we know this, but know little - it is necessary to prove. Your task is to follow him and learn who he's passing information. I think that today he goes to meet a contact. Go quietly behind him. Carefully so he didn't see - he is very careful. How do you know who he's seeing, then smack him, but at the same time with anyone he meets.
No, not now.
There is one thing that I would like to ask you.
He recently retired, so I have to catch up. Remember: to slap, it can and should, but not before he marred someone is leaking information. The second is also necessary to remove.
Clear.
I'm telling you - go to max.
The task was to be performed... not Bad. And I got one too!
Hmm... And what?
Sad to admit, but we had a Snitch... Pavlik name. Information is transmitted to the side, and this thing has got to stop.

So. I think he will try to go to a meeting somewhere between 22:00 and 23:00. At this time dark enough so few people saw it, and the night mutants't poyavivshis. Go ahead, Stalker. On the job you can consider yourself a member of our group. Remember, the Snitch will get hot ! That is, you need to slap him during a meeting; otherwise, the task will be failed.
Are you still here?

Great job, Marked! Here here... a fee for the Snitch. Are invited to relax on our territory whenever they want, and for us to help you, too, can count. There is Only one thing that I'd like to charge. Not tired yet?
Great job, Marked! Here here... a fee for the Snitch. Are invited to relax on our territory whenever they want, and for us to help you, too, can count. There's just one more thing.
What is it?
You warned us and helped to deal with the group Debt plus get rid of the Snitch. For this I think you deserve to be enrolled in our group.
From now on, I enroll you in our group.
Great.
Thanks, I'd love to be one of you.
No offense but I really like something in itself.
What?
If you feel strong enough, you can go to the Outpost near the exit on the Radar for some signs there will be another attempt to break the mutants or Monolith. Need help guys.
Well, you guys on the "Barrier" helped, so relax.
Rest. No work yet.
Yes, the task you failed... this is bad. Okay, the chance is always there!
And what?

Something indicates that in the near future "monolith" again will try to break from the Radar. Need to go to the Cap - he is the commander on the Barrier to see if he needed any help. Although there and find out it is not necessary, and so all is clear...
Okay, I will.
No, I will not yet undertake.
Think, what our guys have! I mean, I send something other than you, nobody...
You failed, and now these documents we can not see as their ears. We don't need such losers.
Yes, the task you failed... this is bad. Okay, since you helped the guys on the Barrier, so be it - the rest is on our site. If that we the case can help you.
There are some work?
Yet.
I told you - go to the Barrier.
Flunk "dolgovtsev" - then we'll talk.
Well.
Lucas reported that you go. Seen these... on the farm?
No.
Sucks... Again "Debt" in the ass is itchy! Well, okay. Come with us, huh?
Well.
Yes.
And many of them are there?
Just do not tell. I don't think very much.
People six to eight. Well equipped.
Go to Lukas.
Have questions?
Yes. Lucas has set the task - to intercept the courier "Debt" on the path from the Radar to the Dead city. Will not prompt where better to do it ?

Hmm. Better to intercept him before he reaches the village of passage to Dead city. There obviously will have to wait and you can hardly cope. And through the village will have to go, and there better not show up. Move to the East village and faster.
And what is there in the village ?
Believe me - nothing good. Creatures are many climbs, anomalies are also missing. I'll tell you later.
You can congratulate?
You look like the guy does not miss! Won't you do me a job? Will do - I'm my Desert eagle will give. Great gun, powerful!..
And what do you want?

Here in the swamp I sat down one guy. The guys watched as he raced out of the village, not seeing the road. Obviously saw something that blew off the roof - now bombarding everyone I know. Need to know what he's such a nadybal, and that our fear in village walk.
No, not this time.
Well, as you wish.
Here is a flash drive. I got her from freaking out guy.
Well, thank you, Stalker! Here's the trunk - earned.
And the ammunition?
Only those in the clip. Sorry, there are no more. Go to the Miser he may be, will be.
I'll try.
Well, good luck. Keep in mind - there's an old minefield, but with the help of old faithful bolt the mines can be worked around.
So, did you know? Well there did they find this psycho?
Here is a flash drive that were freaking out the guy.
What, already?
What do you want to know?
Hey, Stalker! Here?
Affairs agent. Do you know where is your home?
To Lukas - he's the oldest. Go to the main building.
See, coped with the task. Give Lukas the documents.
Go to Lukas, doloris, and then we'll talk, okay?
Well.
Dude,you on the basis of "Freedom"! Make yourself at home!..
Clear.

Only within, right? Understand? You'll be much pamper - blame yourself. There was one dull, so when all got, we beggar a minefield is allowed to walk. Here are a Cheapskate mother, when he was on a head arm of this type fell is something special... yeah... get it?
Understood.
Well done! Free.
And the fresh fish... Go here.
Do not understand.
Where? Stay! We have a good... lunch again today.
Yes, I tasteless.
What?! Damn, why didn't you say so! Only time in vain spent. Fuck off, you tasteless... I'm seriously telling you, man.
What do you not understand? Ah, the story of slow-witted I have not heard yet, I guess?
Not heard.
So. Judge for yourself: the times now are hungry...
I mean?
Yes, directly! A hungry fighter is a bad fighter. And we here in it how many...
What?
Where so much meat to attack? And then, as ordered, you!
Clear.
Man, what happened to that?
Broken?
So you, not me? Wow! And I zadolbali already. How that breaks down, immediately fled here and moan.
And who are you?
I'm a mechanic. Samodelkin... Trunks repaired and everything that will bring. Wait I decided in order to bring.
It?
What! All junk. Zadolbali already. Listen, you have vodka there? I would you... want, the sight is good ladies? The optics are top grade!
No.
It you in vain. So if you go in, don't be shy.
Well.
Here you go.
Well, thank you! Honored. Now at least will have something a bit later to relax.
Good luck.
I'm trying to think...
It really brought the vodka?
What do you want ?
Tricky question - where can I get some artifacts, weapons ?
I have, for the money. Or in the village for free, but more risk.
In the village ?
In the village. There are a lot of anomalies and all sorts of beginners often fall. Where our guys went, want, join them.
Clear.
And what are interesting bring?
What were pleased?
Nothing... just looking around.
You better business loans. Moreover, I have something in mind... to Earn extra money interest you?
Interesting.

I can give you "Crystal", if you have one service. Here the situation is unpleasant... the last time from the village artifacts are not - afraid. They say the bloodsuckers where they got. And these days especially, and nobody to send - even "Duty" invite.
Keep going.
A couple of guys left the village and never returned, and the remaining three are on the outskirts and sit. If you kill the bloodsuckers, I tell you, "Crystal" ladies. Come from?
Not this time.
See, the thing is... Sooner or later someone will still fill up. A "Crystal" thing is rare and expensive.
Taken.
That's good. But if even to find, so get take at a good price.
What ?
Sitting, looking around.
Well, if you will help them in the hunt, I'll give you the artifact called "Crystal". Well ?
We talked and went through the village - a mutant of some catch...
What ? Do not pull the cat's tail !

We Filled up some bitch, but the guys were killed. As the approached the tower, they head pohvatali, and I have a bloody mist before my eyes... a Creature that acts on the brain. I flunked it, but guys it has not helped.
Shitty deal... Sullen - a skilled Stalker. Sorry. Okay, take the artifact for what you guys helped...
Well, the guys went hunting, I was back...
Clear.
You can gear to get?
For a fee, everything is possible.
I have already sorted them out.
Come on, Stalker! Sharp, diarrhea... Okay, a deal''s a deal - keep the "Crystal".
So, how was the hunt?
I killed creatures.
Hard for it?
Medium.
That's interesting... Rushing dirtiest of the Central Zone - where do you get?.. Keep; it's you for work.
I asked you - yokochi bloodsuckers in the village!
I changed my mind.
No question. Only then there is no reward.
Yeah, okay.
I'll try it.
So is the problem that you do... Artifact, therefore, I will not give you.
Who can argue.
Here people are told, you bloodsuckers in the village decided to do. Though, no?
It was the case.
Had a hard time?
Medium.
That's interesting... Rushing dirtiest of the Central Zone - where do you get?.. Keep; it's you for work.
Well, what'd you bring ?
You got the cook in there?
Is how not to be! And why the fuck did he do?
Oh, I'm eating a little to get hold of.
So he's in the kitchen its. As usual, sits and mumbles.
Mutters?
What do you want? Drunk - drunk she is. If cook didn't know how long it would have got rid on all four sides. On nohne it. I'll give you a reference - find.
Thanks for the info.
Not for that.
Who are you in charge here?
And why should you?
Information for it is.
Lucas we have a commander. Go to the main building.
Understood. Thank you.
The same to you. What brings you here ?\n
Who are you here senior ? Case to him there.
Senior have Lucas, located in the main building. But when he comes, hide the weapon, and then they can shoot.\n
Why is that ?
Yes there was a precedent - Lukas almost got killed by some mercenary. Since then reinsured.
Clear.
Okay, go ahead.
Yes so-so. Do not bother...
Welcome.
Wait! Password?!
South African swallow!
Ha ha! Well done! Come on in.
What is the swamp next?

Absolutely a radioactive puddle. It is better not to go: pick up x-rays so that the navel unleash. There stuck in the middle of some type and did not let on. In principle, it is possible to understand: who wants fools talk? And normal there Fig climb.
That at least?
Who the hell knows. They say that one of our own, which is in the village visited.
What kind of village?
Yes there is near the village... one is full of Mutants, anomalies. I myself was not yet, only recently got to the base. Ask max - he's been here for years already.
Where to buy ammo? And then to "Sprout" a bit of a hike, shove don't really want to...
Go to the main building on the first floor you will find.
Privatise, tramp! Decided to taxi us to the light?
Something like.
Want to join us or what?
Or. I'm on the case.
Yeah, well, join the best! We have a lot of fun.
I'll think about it.
Talking horse?
By.
And 9?
Hurt, ugh damn. Hare the runaround. Yet there are options?
Yourself.
Point. Damn again. Well, you and the beetle. Okay, I understand, the password you don't know?
Prompt?
Schasss.
Well let me, not in a field am I going to sleep?
And th weather is good, summer can say. Well take the test - let not - free.
Test?
Yeah, only three questions are to be answered by a real man.
I'm not afraid, ask your questions.
The first is the easiest. Ready? Listen: the breast size of Pamela Anderson?
Third.
No shit you don't know. Get out of here!
Tree.
Fifth.
No shit you don't know. Get out of here.
Seventh.
Well done! Immediately evident - the correct orientation man!
There is such a thing.
The second heavier! So... the Number of rounds in the horn of Russian submachine gun "Bizon"?
Twenty-five.
Sixty-eight.
Fifty-four.
Great! I like you more and more... don't get me wrong!
Okay.
